column1: short of a length and swung away from an off stump. Has a stab at that and is beaten
short of a length on middle stump, steps out and looks to whip it through midwicket, cops it on the thigh
picks out deep square leg! Length at the stumps. Steps out and has a flap at it in front of his body, reaching out and dragging it straight to that fielder
length ball just outside off, defended onto the pad off the inside edge
length ball swinging away late outside off. Follows with his hands and is beaten
short of a length just outside off, gets the back leg across and slaps it aerially to a diving cover's left
length on middle stump, gets the front leg out and gets on top of the ball to sweep this neatly to the square leg boundary
length on middle stump, driven to mid-on
length at off stump, forces him to defend into the off side
length at off, pushed to point with soft hands
short of a length slider in the corridor. Looks to pull and is beaten on the inside edge
length at middle stump, clipped to short fine off the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
shot. Length and angled into the stumps. Gets a half stride out and punches to mid-on's right
short and just outside off, pushed to backward point off the back foot
length on off stump and another lovely punch on the rise, this time just past the bowler's shins
length on middle stump, flicked to midwicket's left from deep in the crease
short of a length in the corridor, looks to defend on the back foot, gets a thick edge to third man
short of a length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
full at off stump, gets to the pitch with his stride and slogs this cleanly to the midwicket boundary
length at off, dropped into the off side with soft hands
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked to short fine's left
brilliant timing. Length on middle stump, onto the back foot to punch sweetly to deep square's right off the back foot
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Jabbed to backward point
length on off stump, punched to mid-off on the up
short of a length and slammed in at an off stump line. Jumps away from the outside edge
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
short and just outside off, cut to sweeper's left
short of a length outside off, looks to cut and gets an inside edge through to the keeper
just clears the square leg boundary. Short ball at middle stump, looks for the pull and slices it to the right of the fielder out there. That hurried him
full and just outside off, looks to drill through off side, gets it down to third man off the toe end
full at off stump, driven back down the pitch. Gets a hand on that and would have got Finch run out if that had hit the stumps. But mid-on has to clean up to his left
slower length ball wide outside off, left alone
full on middle stump, driven into the stumps at the other end. Deflects to mid-on
length at off stump, defended to point's right off the back foot
short at off stump, pulled to deep square
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length at leg stump, flicked to short fine
length at off stump, poked into the leg side with soft hands
short of a length slider outside off, pulled to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket's right
length and just outside off, defended into the covers
yorker length just outside off, sneaks under the bat as he looks to jam it behind point
slower short ball just outside off, cut to point who stops with a dive to his right
bouncer outside off, looks to hook and is beaten for pace
length on off stump, pushed to mid-off from the crease
yorker length at off, jammed out to mid-off
yorker length at middle stump, toe-ended drive to mid-on
bouncer. 121.6kph and down leg side. Bursts through the keeper's attempt to catch that
length and in at leg stump, pushed to deep midwicket off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, chopped to short third man's left
length on middle, whipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
short of a length and in at leg stump. Cops it on the back pad as he gets deep to try and flick this
length and just outside off. Looks to slog, beaten on the inside edge
length on off stump, flicked to midwicket's right
short at middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket's right
overpitched just outside off, clears the front leg and drills that past extra cover
holes out to long-on. Slower length ball at middle stump, wants to pump that straight but it comes off the inside half of the bat and it's an easy take for Miller
length at off stump, looks to flick through midwicket, gets a leading edge that goes to mid-off's left
short of a length on leg stump, looks to flick, cops it on the pad
full on leg stump, driven to long-on
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length across middle stump, looks for the reverse sweep, gets it past short third
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
dropped short, gets back in the crease and pulls that over deep midwicket
length outside off, swept uppishly to long-on
short and wide outside off, inside edge to short fine as he looks to pull
googly at a length on off, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, lets that land and pummels it past the non-striker to beat long-off to his right
short and wide outside off, cut to backward point where a misfield allows them two runs
short at leg stump, pulled to deep square
full and wide outside of, waits on that and opens the face late as he drives, beats sweeper to his left
length outside off, inside edge on the attempted slog sweep, past short fine
short and wide outside off, cut to the point boundary
full on off stump, driven to extra cover's right
length on leg stump, flicked with the turn to deep midwicket
full on middle stump, driven to long-on
taken at midwicket. Full on middle stump, gets the front leg out of the way and has a whip. Comes on fast and off the inside half of the bat, midwicket lunges to his left to hold on
length at leg stump, looks to flick, deflected to fine leg off the front pad
length at off stump, inside edge onto pad as he looks to jab off the front foot
slower ball at a length on leg stump, flicked to square leg with soft hands
short at leg stump, hooked down to fine leg
full on off stump, driven to long-on
length on off stump, pushed into the covers with soft hands
front of the hand quicker one, length at middle stump at 119kph. Flicked to long-on
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
googly at middle, flicked to deep midwicket
leading edge as he looks to flick this. Length ball outside off and turning away, he closes the face on that and gets runs to short third man's left
full outside off, driven down to long-off
slower length ball at middle stump. Looks for the slog sweep and ends up hitting it high and straight to deep midwicket
length outside off, punched on the up to long-off's left
length on off, tapped to extra cover on the up
short of a length just outside off, looks to cut, gets a thick outside edge to third man's left
legcutter at a length, wide outside off. Reaches out and carves that to sweeper's right
full outside off, looks to flick, gets it to short third's left off the toe
full on off, flicked to long-on off the front foot
length at the stumps, shuffles into the off side but is forced to push it past the non-striker
quicker one at a length outside off, he shuffles and looks to sweep. That's come in and hit the outside part of his front pad. Was he hit outside the line? It's marginal. Umpire's call on the replay
length outside off, driven on the rise to long-off
full on leg stump, flicked to short fine
short of a length at off stump, backs away and looks to cut. Gets it over short third off the thick outside edge
edge is taken this time. Slower short ball at the stumps. Backs away and cuts again, but the thick outside edge loops out to the keeper
short outside off, looks to hook and gets it off the high part of the bat. Floated up to midwicket's right but safe in the end
full and down leg side, beaten on the flick
that is plumb. Full, 144.5kph, and headed for middle stump. Gets the front leg across and looks for the flick and is caught right in front
low full toss on leg stump, flicked to fine leg

low full toss, looks to flick, gets it to the keeper off the toe-end. It bounces over the stumps and the keeper runs in and puts in an underarm flick to hit the stumps. TV umpire confirms the non-striker was inside the crease
low full toss on off stump, backs away and chops to backward point on the bounce
full at the stumps, thick inside edge into the midwicket region
full and wide outside off, driven to sweeper's right
slower short ball at off stump, lines up for the big pull, ends up slicing it to long-on's right and a few strides later, Meredith has that in his hands
tonks middle stump! Yorker at a middle stump line and Gleeson is beaten completely as he looks to bring his bat down to try and keep it out. Ellis is on a hat-trick
just keeps it out! Full and tailing in at leg stump. Gurney backs into the leg side and exposes all his stumps. Just manages to jam the bat down on this though
taken at mid-off. Length ball, slower ball outside off. Looks to slap that over the infield but it's just a few steps back for the fielder to get under that
short of a length and swung away in the corridor, pushed to backward point
full and swung away in the corridor, beaten as he looks to drive without the feet moving
short at leg stump, looks to pull, gets a top edge to float over short fine leg
short of a length at middle stump, defended down the pitch
short of a length on leg stump, clipped into the leg side off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
length and swung in at leg stump, flicked to deep square's right
length at leg stump, swivels and looks to pull. Cops it on the thigh
length on leg stump, looks to flick, cops it on the pad
short and wide outside off, left alone
slips through from under the keeper. Short and angled across the left-hander. He's beaten on the cut and then it swings inwards and to the keeper's right. He can't get his body down at it
length outside off and he stands tall to punch handsomely through the covers
short outside off, cut to sweeper cover
length and just outside off, pushed to backward point with the angle
short of a length and slanted across the stumps, stands tall and times this punch nicely on the rise to beat cover point to the right
full on middle stump, driven to mid-on
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on off, pushed to mid-off on the up
just past off stump. Yorker in the corridor and he's late bringing the bat down on that
low full toss on leg stump, driven to long-on
past off stump again. Length and pushed across the batsman. Backs away and has a heave. Beaten

straight to extra cover. Milenko's struggle ends. Full at the stumps. Backs into the leg side again. This time he goes with the angle and tries to slice it over the infield. Comes off the bottom of the bat and floats harmlessly for Finch
caught behind! Cooper on a hat-trick now! Short of a length outside off, sliding straight on. He looks to cut and gets a healthy edge on that and Harper holds on nicely
length and floated down leg side, flicked to short fine's left
beaten on the cut. Short and wide, slaps from under it
length at middle, flicked to midwicket
length at leg stump, flicked to deep backward square's left. A nice throw to the non-striker's end but Short just makes it
length on leg stump, flicked to deep backward square
length ball just outside off, driven to extra cover
length and in at off stump, backs into the crease and flicks to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on middle, flicked to midwicket's right on the front foot
full on middle, flicked to square leg's right
full on middle, driven to long-on
launched over the off side. Class from Short. Steps out to the pitch of this, makes room by going leg side and then lifts it over extra cover
short at middle stump, gets deep in the crease now and pulls to the square leg boundary. Making the part-timer bowl where he wants it
length on off, dropped into the covers with soft hands
length on middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on off, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
length on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
length and across off, pushed to sweeper cover
length on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper's right
length on middle, punched to long-on
length at middle, pushed into the leg side
length at middle, flicked down the pitch, can't get it past Boyce to his right
length on off, pushed down the pitch
length outside off, driven on the up to extra cover
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket with the angle
length on leg stump, backs into the leg side and sweeps uppishly to deep square's left. He dives to his left to stop that on the bounce
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square
length on middle, punched to long-on off the back foot
length on off, pushed back to the bowler
length at off, driven on the up to long-off
length outside off, punched to long-on off the back foot
length outside off, steps out and slams it to long-off
length at leg stump, pushed to long-on off the back foot
short of a length outside off, cut to sweeper's right
slower ball at a length on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
short of a length outside off, punched to sweeper's right
length at leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket from the crease
short at off stump, pulled with the angle to deep square
length at leg stump, pulled to long leg
and again. That's a poor line from Gurney. Short of a length at leg stump again and he stands tall and steers this wide of short fine leg. Brings up his fifty
full outside off, leans in and flicks to deep midwicket
full and just outside off, looks to drive, comes back down the pitch off the toe-end
googly, wide outside off, left alone
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length outside off, shuffles to flick and is struck on the pad. A bat-pad situation there and the lbw appeal is turned down
length outside off, driven to long-off's right
full at off stump, nudges past the non-striker with soft hands
length on middle stump, backs away to sweep, gets an inside edge past short fine
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length and angled in at leg stump, hurriedly pushed through midwicket off the back foot
full on leg stump, leans in and flicks to deep midwicket
length at off, steps out and drives to long-on
full at the stumps, sweeps to deep square
full and fast just outside off, driven firmly back at the bowler who looks to parry it onto the stumps but can't manage it
length and just outside off, reaches out and clubs it on the rise past his partner at the other end
length on off stump, punched to long-on
full on off stump, shuffles and flicks to deep midwicket
trapped in front! Length ball at middle stump, on the back foot to try and flick. Rapped on the back leg in front of the stumps. Did that pitch in line? Umpire thinks so
full on middle stump, leans in and flicks to long-on
full and just outside off, clipped to deep midwicket
length on middle stump, straightening as he looks to get forward. Leading edge to extra cover's right. Finch throws at the non-striker's and they get an extra run off the overthrow
length at middle, pushed through midwicket
full on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
full on off stump, driven with the turn to long-off
length at leg stump, flicked to deep square
length at middle stump, leans in and punches to long-on
short of a length on middle, punched to deep midwicket off the back foot
length on leg stump, flicked down to long-on
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket
length at off, inside edge onto boot off the front foot
length outside off, steps out and flicks to long-on
full slower ball down leg side. Can't get bat on it. He was done for pace but that was too wide
slower short ball outside off, slapped on the up to sweeper's right
slower length ball outside off, driven to sweeper's right on the up
smoked over deep midwicket! Overpitched, normal-paced delivery at middle stump. Right in the swinging arc and swing he does
full slower ball at leg stump, driven to long-on
slower length ball at middle stump, flicked to deep midwicket
full outside off, driven to long-off
short of a length just outside off, carves that to sweeper's left
slower length ball wide outside off, driven aerially to long-off's left
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Delicately pushed to deep midwicket's left
dropped. Slower length ball outside off. Swings through the line and hits it back at Richardson, who gets two hands high to his left in the follow through but can't hold on
slower length ball at off stump, sliced to backward point

fifty. Gets low and into the off side to line up for a ramp over short fine. It's a full toss outside off and he quickly adjusts to open the face and steer this between keeper and short third. Oh it's deemed to have come off his back leg, in fact. So that doesn't bring up his fifty
hammered over midwicket. Slower short ball from around the wicket, sitting up for a wallop and he hits that hard
length at the stumps, flicked into the leg side
slower length ball outside off, driven on the up to sweeper's left
full and into the toes, flicked to deep midwicket
yorker outside off, looks to drive and gets that to midwicket off the inside edge
yorker at middle stump, backs away and stabs this to long-off and that is his fifty
and that will seal it. Full outside off, has a heave across the line, gets a thick outside edge past short third man
